price: ផ្ទុយទៅវិញ តើសតិរបស់ពួកគេបានបញ្ជាឱ្យពួកគេ និយាយដូចេ្នះឬ? ឬមួយក៏ពួកគេជាក្រុមដែលបំពានលើខួ្លនឯង?
arabic: أَمۡ تَأۡمُرُهُمۡ أَحۡلَٰمُهُم بِهَٰذَآۚ أَمۡ هُمۡ قَوۡمٞ طَاغُونَ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: am tamuruhum aḥlāmuhum bihādhā am hum qawmun ṭāghūna
